column2: Play as Pratap Singh Bhonsle of Marathas
Play as Akbar Timurid of Mughals
Play as George Windsor of United Kingdom
Congress of Vienna
Order in Europe is being restored after chaos of Napoleonic Wars. Meanwhile Britain, Mughals, and Marathas fight for control over India, but many local Indian rulers would much rather be independent.
Play as Stanislaw Wodzicki of Krakow
Play as Friedrich Wilhelm Hohenzollern of Prussia
Play as Vittorio Emanuele Savoia of Piedmont-Sardinia
Play as Mahmud Ottoman of Ottoman Empire
Fall of Marathas
With India conquered, Britain is the world's greatest empire, at least for now. Will anyone challenge their supremacy?
Play as Victoria Windsor of United Kingdom
Play as Ranjit Singh of Punjab
Play as Willem Oranje-Nassau of Netherlands
Play as Otto Wittelsbach of Greece
Victorian Era
Victoria, Empress of United Kingdom and India, leads the greatest empire the world has ever seen, but will her empire survive where all states as vast and diverse failed in the past?

Kingdom of Italy

Fall of Ottomans
Collapse of Ottoman Empire, Austria-Hungary, and Tsarist Russia created power vacuum in Central Europe. Who's going to become the new dominant power?

Iranian Revolution
Shiite Islamic Revolution in Iran and Saddam Hussein's ambition to become leader of Arab world are on a colision course.

Fall of Soviet Union
Collapse of the Soviet Union freed nations of Soviet periphery, but also woke up dormant national conflicts. Will Russia continue its descent into chaos, or is it just a temporary setback?
Play as Vladimir Putin of Russia
Play as Volodymyr Zelenskyy of Ukraine
Play as Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi of The Sunni Caliphate
Play as Nicola Sturgeon of Scotland
Modern Times
After a brief period of calm following breakup of Soviet Union, new trouble is stirring. Putin challenges borders in former Soviet sphere, radical Islamists rally around a new caliph.
